title: Bug 7785: SaveAs action does not remember the file type
description: The SaveAs action in the application does not remember the file type. Additionally, the icon of the saved file changes from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the java file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the file extension (which is not requested).
7) Click Ok.

Observe that the file is added to the specified location in the Navigator view, but the file extension is not shown.
